page.title: 17COMMUNITY HEALTH
page.content: The Phab Club is for physically handicapped and able bodied people and it aims to get these people to meet together.I go to the local Phab Club every thursday night between 7.00 and 10.00p.m. It costs 30p to get in and the membership fee for a year is Â£1. A lady called Lorna organises the club. There are about 50 people in the Phab club which does not include the staff who work there. There are club nightsd when you go to disco's or parties at posh places, for example we once went to a country club for the evening. You also go to camp every six months This May a trip is going to Colchester,last year they went to Gillwall Park. The most enjoyable thing that we do is taking the physically handicapped swimming - I think that it is an excellent night out.
